name: [CANCELED?] Need Help With That?
description:
(THERE ARE 2 ZIPS ONE CONTAINING AN IN GAME TASKBAR AND WINDOW BORDER THE OTHER CONTAINS THE SAME GAME BUT WITHOUT THEM)

So, uh yea this game is probably never going to be finished, as it has been put on hold indefinitely everything (aka characters sprites music) was made by me. 

If you like this character and or concept I may incorporate some pieces of this in future games, I make. The game was originally going to be that snippy (the player) would go around the document "fixing" words and sentences and the cursor would chase snippy, if touched by the cursor you lose a life, more "fixed" things in the document the better. There was also going to potentially be a second, flaming red cursor that would be faster and probably would be an insta-kill. Not many more things were planned for it because after all the ideas mentioned being removed it was simplified.  (There was also an idea to turn this into a horror game about snippy being possessed by the soul of a dead person and him wanting to be freed.)

Thanks for listening to my dumb rant about my clippy inspired character.
